summary: THE ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON. CONSUMER HAD VEHICLE SERVICED. THE DEALERSHIP INDICATED THAT 3 OUT OF 4 IGNITION COILS MISFIRED. THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM, THAT COULD MAKE THE VEHICLE INOPERATIVE  AND SHUT DONE ENGINE PER DEALERSHIP.   TS  ALL 4 IGNITION COILS WERE REPLACED.   3 IGNITION COILS WERE REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY.  *TT
